name: os_version
description: A single row containing the operating system name and version.

version.description: Pretty, suitable for presentation, OS version

name: platform_info
description: Information about EFI/UEFI/ROM and platform/boot.

name: etc_hosts
description: Line-parsed /etc/hosts.

name: uptime
description: Track time passed since last boot.

name: users
description: Local user accounts (including domain accounts that have logged on locally (Windows)).

gid_signed.description: Default group ID as int64 signed (Apple)

name: hash
description: Filesystem hash data.

path.description: Must provide a path or directory

directory.description: Must provide a path or directory

md5.description: MD5 hash of provided filesystem data

sha1.description: SHA1 hash of provided filesystem data

sha256.description: SHA256 hash of provided filesystem data

name: carves
description: Forensic Carves.

time.description: Time at which the carve was kicked off

sha256.description: A SHA256 sum of the carved archive

path.description: The path of the requested carve

status.description: Status of the carve, can be STARTING, PENDING, SUCCESS, or FAILED

carve_guid.description: Identifying value of the carve session

carve.description: Set this value to '1' to start a file carve

name: listening_ports
description: Processes with listening (bound) network sockets/ports.

name: system_info
description: System information for identification.

uuid.description: Unique ID provided by the system

cpu_brand.description: CPU brand string, contains vendor and model

cpu_physical_cores.description: Number of physical CPU cores in to the system

cpu_logical_cores.description: Number of logical CPU cores available to the system

name: processes
description: All running processes on the host system.

name.description: The process path or shorthand argv[0]

on_disk.description: The process path exists yes=1, no=0, unknown=-1

wired_size.description: Bytes of unpagable memory used by process

resident_size.description: Bytes of private memory used by process

user_time.description: CPU time in milliseconds spent in user space

system_time.description: CPU time in milliseconds spent in kernel space

start_time.description: Process start time in seconds since Epoch, in case of error -1

threads.description: Number of threads used by process

name: carbon_black_info
description: Returns info about a Carbon Black sensor install.

sensor_id.description: Sensor ID of the Carbon Black sensor

collect_store_files.description: If the sensor is configured to send back binaries to the Carbon Black server

collect_module_loads.description: If the sensor is configured to capture module loads

collect_module_info.description: If the sensor is configured to collect metadata of binaries

collect_file_mods.description: If the sensor is configured to collect file modification events

collect_reg_mods.description: If the sensor is configured to collect registry modification events

collect_net_conns.description: If the sensor is configured to collect network connections

collect_processes.description: If the sensor is configured to process events

collect_cross_processes.description: If the sensor is configured to cross process events

collect_emet_events.description: If the sensor is configured to EMET events

collect_data_file_writes.description: If the sensor is configured to collect non binary file writes

collect_process_user_context.description: If the sensor is configured to collect the user running a process

log_file_disk_quota_mb.description: Event file disk quota in MB

log_file_disk_quota_percentage.description: Event file disk quota in a percentage

protection_disabled.description: If the sensor is configured to report tamper events

event_queue.description: Size in bytes of Carbon Black event files on disk

binary_queue.description: Size in bytes of binaries waiting to be sent to Carbon Black server

name: example
description: This is an example table spec.

points.description: This is a signed SQLite int column

size.description: This is a signed SQLite bigint column

name: interface_details
description: Detailed information and stats of network interfaces.

metric.description: Metric based on the speed of the interface

name: python_packages
description: Python packages installed in a system.

license.description: License under which package is launched

path.description: Path at which this module resides

directory.description: Directory where Python modules are located

name: chrome_extensions
description: Chrome browser extensions.

uid.description: The local user that owns the extension

profile.description: The Chrome profile that contains this extension

persistent.description: 1 If extension is persistent across all tabs else 0

permissions.description: The permissions required by the extension

name: logged_in_users
description: Users with an active shell on the system.

name: curl
description: Perform an http request and return stats about it.

method.description: The HTTP method for the request

user_agent.description: The user-agent string to use for the request

response_code.description: The HTTP status code for the response

round_trip_time.description: Time taken to complete the request

bytes.description: Number of bytes in the response

name: process_memory_map
description: Process memory mapped files and pseudo device/regions.

path.description: Path to mapped file or mapped type

pseudo.description: 1 If path is a pseudo path, else 0

name: etc_services
description: Line-parsed /etc/services.

aliases.description: Optional space separated list of other names for a service

name: groups
description: Local system groups.

gid_signed.description: A signed int64 version of gid

name: process_open_sockets
description: Processes which have open network sockets on the system.

path.description: For UNIX sockets (family=AF_UNIX), the domain path

name: routes
description: The active route table for the host system.

mtu.description: Maximum Transmission Unit for the route

metric.description: Cost of route. Lowest is preferred

name: kernel_info
description: Basic active kernel information.

name: interface_addresses
description: Network interfaces and relevant metadata.

type.description: Type of address. One of dhcp, manual, auto, other, unknown

name: etc_protocols
description: Line-parsed /etc/protocols.

name: arp_cache
description: Address resolution cache, both static and dynamic (from ARP, NDP).

interface.description: Interface of the network for the MAC

name: user_groups
description: Local system user group relationships.

name: cpuid
description: Useful CPU features from the cpuid ASM call.

output_register.description: Register used to for feature value

output_bit.description: Bit in register value for feature value

name: atom_packages
description: Lists all atom packages in a directory or globally installed in a system.

name: curl_certificate
description: Inspect TLS certificates by connecting to input hostnames.

common_name.description: Common name of company issued to

name: lldp_neighbors
description: LLDP neighbors of interfaces.

chassis_sysname.description: CPU brand string, contains vendor and model

chassis_sys_description.description: Max number of CPU physical cores

chassis_mgmt_ips.description: Comma delimited list of chassis management IPS

med_capability_mdi_pse.description: Is MED MDI PSE capability enabled

med_capability_mdi_pd.description: Is MED MDI PD capability enabled

med_policies.description: Comma delimited list of MED policies

vlans.description: Comma delimited list of vlan ids

ppvids_supported.description: Comma delimited list of supported PPVIDs

ppvids_enabled.description: Comma delimited list of enabled PPVIDs

name: device_hash
description: Similar to the hash table, but use TSK and allow block address access.

device.description: Absolute file path to device node

md5.description: MD5 hash of provided inode data

sha1.description: SHA1 hash of provided inode data

sha256.description: SHA256 hash of provided inode data

name: device_partitions
description: Use TSK to enumerate details about partitions on a disk device.

device.description: Absolute file path to device node

name: device_file
description: Similar to the file table, but use TSK and allow block address access.

device.description: Absolute file path to device node

path.description: A logical path within the device node

name: smart_drive_info
description: Drive information read by SMART controller utilizing autodetect.

disk_id.description: Physical slot number of device, only exists when hardware storage controller exists

driver_type.description: The explicit device type used to retrieve the SMART information

additional_product_id.description: An additional drive identifier if any

in_smartctl_db.description: Boolean value for if drive is recognized

read_device_identity_failure.description: Error string for device id read, if any

name: yara_events
description: Track YARA matches for files specified in configuration data.

name: yara
description: Track YARA matches for files or PIDs.

name: intel_me_info
description: Intel ME/CSE Info.

name: selinux_events
description: Track SELinux events.

time.description: Time of execution in UNIX time

uptime.description: Time of execution in system uptime

name: socket_events
description: Track network socket opens and closes.

fd.description: The file description for the process socket

socket.description: The local path (UNIX domain socket only)

time.description: Time of execution in UNIX time

uptime.description: Time of execution in system uptime

name: elf_symbols
description: ELF symbol list.

name: portage_use
description: List of enabled portage USE values for specific package.

version.description: The version of the installed package

use.description: USE flag which has been enabled for package

name: rpm_package_files
description: RPM packages that are currently installed on the host system.

username.description: File default username from info DB

groupname.description: File default groupname from info DB

mode.description: File permissions mode from info DB

size.description: Expected file size in bytes from RPM info DB

sha256.description: SHA256 file digest from RPM info DB

name: shared_memory
description: OS shared memory regions.

pid.description: Process ID to last use the segment

creator_pid.description: Process ID that created the segment

name: iptables
description: Linux IP packet filtering and NAT tool.

policy.description: Policy that applies for this rule.

target.description: Target that applies for this rule.

iniface_mask.description: Input interface mask for the rule.

outiface_mask.description: Output interface mask for the rule.

packets.description: Number of matching packets for this rule.

bytes.description: Number of matching bytes for this rule.

name: portage_keywords
description: A summary about portage configurations like keywords, mask and unmask.

version.description: The version which are affected by the use flags, empty means all

keyword.description: The keyword applied to the package

name: elf_segments
description: ELF segment information.

name: md_devices
description: Software RAID array settings.

raid_level.description: Current raid level of the array

size.description: size of the array in blocks

raid_disks.description: Number of configured RAID disks in array

nr_raid_disks.description: Number of partitions or disk devices to comprise the array

working_disks.description: Number of working disks in array

active_disks.description: Number of active disks in array

failed_disks.description: Number of active disks in array

spare_disks.description: Number of active disks in array

bitmap_on_mem.description: Pages allocated in in-memory bitmap, if enabled

other.description: Other information associated with array from /proc/mdstat

name: process_namespaces
description: Linux namespaces for processes running on the host system.

name: syslog_events
description: Linux namespaces for processes running on the host system.

name: rpm_packages
description: RPM packages that are currently installed on the host system.

sha1.description: SHA1 hash of the package contents

name: portage_packages
description: List of currently installed packages.

version.description: The version which are affected by the use flags, empty means all

build_time.description: Unix time when package was built

repository.description: From which repository the ebuild was used

world.description: If package is in the world file

name: process_file_events
description: A File Integrity Monitor implementation using the audit service.

time.description: Time of execution in UNIX time

partial.description: True if this is a partial event (i.e.: this process existed before we started osquery)

cwd.description: The current working directory of the process

path.description: The path associated with the event

dest_path.description: The canonical path associated with the event

uid.description: The uid of the process performing the action

gid.description: The gid of the process performing the action

euid.description: Effective user ID of the process using the file

egid.description: Effective group ID of the process using the file

uptime.description: Time of execution in system uptime

name: md_drives
description: Drive devices used for Software RAID.

name: ec2_instance_tags
description: EC2 instance tag key value pairs.

name: npm_packages
description: Lists all npm packages in a directory or globally installed in a system.

directory.description: Node module's directory where this package is located

name: elf_info
description: ELF file information.

name: md_personalities
description: Software RAID setting supported by the kernel.

name.description: Name of personality supported by kernel

name: kernel_modules
description: Linux kernel modules both loaded and within the load search path.

name: shadow
description: Local system users encrypted passwords and related information. Please note, that you usually need superuser rights to access `/etc/shadow`.

last_change.description: Date of last password change (starting from UNIX epoch date)

min.description: Minimal number of days between password changes

max.description: Maximum number of days between password changes

warning.description: Number of days before password expires to warn user about it

inactive.description: Number of days after password expires until account is blocked

expire.description: Number of days since UNIX epoch date until account is disabled

name: memory_info
description: Main memory information in bytes.

memory_total.description: Total amount of physical RAM, in bytes

memory_free.description: The amount of physical RAM, in bytes, left unused by the system

buffers.description: The amount of physical RAM, in bytes, used for file buffers

cached.description: The amount of physical RAM, in bytes, used as cache memory

swap_cached.description: The amount of swap, in bytes, used as cache memory

active.description: The total amount of buffer or page cache memory, in bytes, that is in active use

inactive.description: The total amount of buffer or page cache memory, in bytes, that are free and available

swap_total.description: The total amount of swap available, in bytes

swap_free.description: The total amount of swap free, in bytes

name: msr
description: Various pieces of data stored in the model specific register per processor. NOTE: the msr kernel module must be enabled, and osquery must be run as root.

processor_number.description: The processor number as reported in /proc/cpuinfo

turbo_disabled.description: Whether the turbo feature is disabled.

rapl_power_limit.description: Run Time Average Power Limiting power limit.

rapl_energy_status.description: Run Time Average Power Limiting energy status.

rapl_power_units.description: Run Time Average Power Limiting power units.

name: memory_map
description: OS memory region map.

name: deb_packages
description: The installed DEB package database.

name: elf_dynamic
description: ELF dynamic section information.

name: ec2_instance_metadata
description: EC2 instance metadata.

architecture.description: Hardware architecture of this EC2 instance

region.description: AWS region in which this instance launched

availability_zone.description: Availability zone in which this instance launched

local_hostname.description: Private IPv4 DNS hostname of the first interface of this instance

local_ipv4.description: Private IPv4 address of the first interface of this instance

mac.description: MAC address for the first network interface of this EC2 instance

security_groups.description: Comma separated list of security group names

iam_arn.description: If there is an IAM role associated with the instance, contains instance profile ARN

ami_id.description: AMI ID used to launch this EC2 instance

account_id.description: AWS account ID which owns this EC2 instance

ssh_public_key.description: SSH public key. Only available if supplied at instance launch time

name: kernel_integrity
description: Various Linux kernel integrity checked attributes.

sycall_addr_modified.description: 0 or 1, for whether a syscall table pointer is modified

text_segment_hash.description: Hash value for the kernel's .text memory segment

name: elf_sections
description: ELF section information.

name: ibridge_info
description: Information about the Apple iBridge hardware controller.

boot_uuid.description: Boot UUID of the iBridge controller

firmware_version.description: The build version of the firmware

unique_chip_id.description: Unique id of the iBridge controller

name: event_taps
description: Returns information about installed event taps.

event_tapped.description: The mask that identifies the set of events to be observed.

process_being_tapped.description: The process ID of the target application

tapping_process.description: The process ID of the application that created the event tap.

name: mdfind
description: Run searches against the spotlight database.

path.description: Path of the file returned from spotlight

query.description: The query that was run to find the file

name: time_machine_backups
description: Backups to drives using TimeMachine.

name: wifi_survey
description: Scan for nearby WiFi networks.

bssid.description: The current basic service set identifier

country_code.description: The country code (ISO/IEC 3166-1:1997) for the network

rssi.description: The current received signal strength indication (dbm)

name: keychain_acls
description: Applications that have ACL entries in the keychain.

authorizations.description: A space delimited set of authorization attributes

path.description: The path of the authorized application

description.description: The description included with the ACL entry

label.description: An optional label tag that may be included with the keychain entry

name: cups_destinations
description: Returns all configured printers.

name: safari_extensions
description: Safari browser extension details for all users.

uid.description: The local user that owns the extension

sdk.description: Bundle SDK used to compile extension

name: alf
description: OS X application layer firewall (ALF) service details.

allow_signed_enabled.description: 1 If allow signed mode is enabled else 0

global_state.description: 1 If the firewall is enabled with exceptions, 2 if the firewall is configured to block all incoming connections, else 0

logging_enabled.description: 1 If logging mode is enabled else 0

stealth_enabled.description: 1 If stealth mode is enabled else 0

name: sip_config
description: Apple's System Integrity Protection (rootless) status.

config_flag.description: The System Integrity Protection config flag

enabled.description: 1 if this configuration is enabled, otherwise 0

enabled_nvram.description: 1 if this configuration is enabled, otherwise 0

name: alf_services
description: OS X application layer firewall (Firewall) services.

name: asl
description: Queries the Apple System Log data structure for system events.

sender.description: Sender's identification string.  Default is process name.

pid.description: Sending process ID encoded as a string.  Set automatically.

gid.description: GID that sent the log message (set by the server).

uid.description: UID that sent the log message (set by the server).

level.description: Log level number.  See levels in asl.h.

ref_pid.description: Reference PID for messages proxied by launchd

ref_proc.description: Reference process for messages proxied by launchd

extra.description: Extra columns, in JSON format. Queries against this column are performed entirely in SQLite, so do not benefit from efficient querying via asl.h.

name: authorization_mechanisms
description: OS X Authorization mechanisms database.

mechanism.description: Name of the mechanism that will be called

privileged.description: If privileged it will run as root, else as an anonymous user

name: authorizations
description: OS X Authorization rights database.

label.description: Item name, usually in reverse domain format

name: xprotect_reports
description: Database of XProtect matches (if user generated/sent an XProtect report).

user_action.description: Action taken by user after prompted

name: signature
description: File (executable, bundle, installer, disk) code signing status.

path.description: Must provide a path or directory

hash_resources.description: Set to 1 to also hash resources, or 0 otherwise. Default is 1

arch.description: If applicable, the arch of the signed code

signed.description: 1 If the file is signed else 0

identifier.description: The signing identifier sealed into the signature

cdhash.description: Hash of the application Code Directory

team_identifier.description: The team signing identifier sealed into the signature

name: iokit_registry
description: The full IOKit registry without selecting a plane.

busy_state.description: 1 if the node is in a busy state else 0

name: wifi_status
description: OS X current WiFi status.

bssid.description: The current basic service set identifier

country_code.description: The country code (ISO/IEC 3166-1:1997) for the network

security_type.description: Type of security on this network

rssi.description: The current received signal strength indication (dbm)

mode.description: The current operating mode for the Wi-Fi interface

name: sandboxes
description: OS X application sandboxes container details.

bundle_path.description: Application bundle used by the sandbox

name: managed_policies
description: The managed configuration policies from AD, MDM, MCX, etc.

uuid.description: Optional UUID assigned to policy set

manual.description: 1 if policy was loaded manually, otherwise 0

name: nfs_shares
description: NFS shares exported by the host.

options.description: Options string set on the export share

readonly.description: 1 if the share is exported readonly else 0

name: temperature_sensors
description: Machine's temperature sensors.

key.description: The SMC key on OS X

name: device_firmware
description: A best-effort list of discovered firmware versions.

name: xprotect_meta
description: Database of the machine's XProtect browser-related signatures.

name: launchd_overrides
description: Override keys, per user, for LaunchDaemons and Agents.

uid.description: User ID applied to the override, 0 applies to all

path.description: Path to daemon or agent plist

name: alf_exceptions
description: OS X application layer firewall (ALF) service exceptions.

path.description: Path to the executable that is excepted

name: power_sensors
description: Machine power (currents, voltages, wattages, etc) sensors.

key.description: The SMC key on OS X

category.description: The sensor category: currents, voltage, wattage

name: sharing_preferences
description: OS X Sharing preferences.

screen_sharing.description: 1 If screen sharing is enabled else 0

file_sharing.description: 1 If file sharing is enabled else 0

printer_sharing.description: 1 If printer sharing is enabled else 0

remote_login.description: 1 If remote login is enabled else 0

remote_management.description: 1 If remote management is enabled else 0

remote_apple_events.description: 1 If remote apple events are enabled else 0

internet_sharing.description: 1 If internet sharing is enabled else 0

bluetooth_sharing.description: 1 If bluetooth sharing is enabled for any user else 0

disc_sharing.description: 1 If CD or DVD sharing is enabled else 0

content_caching.description: 1 If content caching is enabled else 0

name: alf_explicit_auths
description: ALF services explicitly allowed to perform networking.

name: package_install_history
description: OS X package install history.

source.description: Install source: usually the installer process name

name: ad_config
description: OS X Active Directory configuration.

name: launchd
description: LaunchAgents and LaunchDaemons from default search paths.

path.description: Path to daemon or agent plist

name.description: File name of plist (used by launchd)

run_at_load.description: Should the program run on launch load

keep_alive.description: Should the process be restarted if killed

disabled.description: Skip loading this daemon or agent on boot

username.description: Run this daemon or agent as this username

groupname.description: Run this daemon or agent as this group

stdout_path.description: Pipe stdout to a target path

stderr_path.description: Pipe stderr to a target path

program_arguments.description: Command line arguments passed to program

watch_paths.description: Key that launches daemon or agent if path is modified

queue_directories.description: Similar to watch_paths but only with non-empty directories

inetd_compatibility.description: Run this daemon or agent as it was launched from inetd

start_on_mount.description: Run daemon or agent every time a filesystem is mounted

root_directory.description: Key used to specify a directory to chroot to before launch

working_directory.description: Key used to specify a directory to chdir to before launch

process_type.description: Key describes the intended purpose of the job

name: xprotect_entries
description: Database of the machine's XProtect signatures.

filename.description: Use this file name to match

filetype.description: Use this file type to match

optional.description: Match any of the identities/patterns for this XProtect name

uses_pattern.description: Uses a match pattern instead of identity

name: homebrew_packages
description: The installed homebrew package database.

name: preferences
description: OS X defaults and managed preferences.

domain.description: Application ID usually in com.name.product format

value.description: String value of most CF types

forced.description: 1 if the value is forced/managed, else 0

username.description: (optional) read preferences for a specific user

name: kernel_extensions
description: OS X's kernel extensions, both loaded and within the load search path.

size.description: Bytes of wired memory used by extension

linked_against.description: Indexes of extensions this extension is linked against

name: extended_attributes
description: Returns the extended attributes for files (similar to Windows ADS).

key.description: Name of the value generated from the extended attribute

value.description: The parsed information from the attribute

base64.description: 1 if the value is base64 encoded else 0

name: cups_jobs
description: Returns all completed print jobs from cups.

destination.description: The printer the job was sent to

user.description: The user who printed the job

format.description: The format of the print job

size.description: The size of the print job

processing_time.description: How long the job took to process

creation_time.description: When the print request was initiated

name: virtual_memory_info
description: Darwin Virtual Memory statistics.

wired.description: Total number of wired down pages.

faults.description: Total number of calls to vm_faults.

zero_fill.description: Total number of zero filled pages.

file_backed.description: Total number of file backed pages.

compressor.description: The number of pages used to store compressed VM pages.

decompressed.description: The total number of pages that have been decompressed by the VM compressor.

compressed.description: The total number of pages that have been compressed by the VM compressor.

page_ins.description: The total number of requests for pages from a pager.

page_outs.description: Total number of pages paged out.

swap_ins.description: The total number of compressed pages that have been swapped out to disk.

swap_outs.description: The total number of compressed pages that have been swapped back in from disk.

name: battery
description: Provides information about the internal battery of a Macbook.

manufacture_date.description: The date the battery was manufactured UNIX Epoch

health.description: One of the following: "Good" describes a well-performing battery, "Fair" describes a functional battery with limited capacity, or "Poor" describes a battery that's not capable of providing power

condition.description: One of the following: "Normal" indicates the condition of the battery is within normal tolerances, "Service Needed" indicates that the battery should be checked out by a licensed Mac repair service, "Permanent Failure" indicates the battery needs replacement

state.description: One of the following: "AC Power" indicates the battery is connected to an external power source, "Battery Power" indicates that the battery is drawing internal power, "Off Line" indicates the battery is off-line or no longer connected

charging.description: 1 if the battery is currently being charged by a power source. 0 otherwise

charged.description: 1 if the battery is currently completely charged. 0 otherwise

designed_capacity.description: The battery's designed capacity in mAh

max_capacity.description: The battery's actual capacity when it is fully charged in mAh

current_capacity.description: The battery's current charged capacity in mAh

percent_remaining.description: The percentage of battery remaining before it is drained

amperage.description: The battery's current amperage in mA

voltage.description: The battery's current voltage in mV

minutes_until_empty.description: The number of minutes until the battery is fully depleted. This value is -1 if this time is still being calculated

minutes_to_full_charge.description: The number of minutes until the battery is fully charged. This value is -1 if this time is still being calculated

name: running_apps
description: OSX applications currently running on the host system.

bundle_identifier.description: The bundle identifier of the application

is_active.description: 1 if the application is in focus, 0 otherwise

name: quicklook_cache
description: Files and thumbnails within OS X's Quicklook Cache.

last_hit_date.description: Apple date format for last thumbnail cache hit

hit_count.description: Number of cache hits on thumbnail

name: disk_events
description: Track DMG disk image events (appearance/disappearance) when opened.

path.description: Path of the DMG file accessed

uuid.description: UUID of the volume inside DMG if available

time.description: Time of appearance/disappearance in UNIX time

name: user_interaction_events
description: Track user interaction events from macOS' event tapping framework.

name: kernel_panics
description: System kernel panic logs.

registers.description: A space delimited line of register:value pairs

module_backtrace.description: Modules appearing in the crashed module's backtrace

dependencies.description: Module dependencies existing in crashed module's backtrace

name.description: Process name corresponding to crashed thread

uptime.description: System uptime at kernel panic in nanoseconds

name: gatekeeper_approved_apps
description: Gatekeeper apps a user has allowed to run.

path.description: Path of executable allowed to run

name: wifi_networks
description: OS X known/remembered Wi-Fi networks list.

security_type.description: Type of security on this network

last_connected.description: Last time this netword was connected to as a unix_time

possibly_hidden.description: 1 if network is possibly a hidden network, 0 otherwise

roaming_profile.description: Describe the roaming profile, usually one of Single, Dual  or Multi

captive_portal.description: 1 if this network has a captive portal, 0 otherwise

auto_login.description: 1 if auto login is enabled, 0 otherwise

temporarily_disabled.description: 1 if this network is temporarily disabled, 0 otherwise

disabled.description: 1 if this network is disabled, 0 otherwise

name: browser_plugins
description: All C/NPAPI browser plugin details for all users.

uid.description: The local user that owns the plugin

sdk.description: Build SDK used to compile plugin

name: fan_speed_sensors
description: Fan speeds.

name: package_bom
description: OS X package bill of materials (BOM) file list.

uid.description: Expected user of file or directory

gid.description: Expected group of file or directory

name: smc_keys
description: Apple's system management controller keys.

size.description: Reported size of data in bytes

value.description: A type-encoded representation of the key value

hidden.description: 1 if this key is normally hidden, otherwise 0

name: time_machine_destinations
description: Locations backed up to using Time Machine.

name: app_schemes
description: OS X application schemes and handlers (e.g., http, file, mailto).

enabled.description: 1 if this handler is the OS default, else 0

external.description: 1 if this handler does NOT exist on OS X by default, else 0

protected.description: 1 if this handler is protected (reserved) by OS X, else 0

name: gatekeeper
description: OS X Gatekeeper Details.

assessments_enabled.description: 1 If a Gatekeeper is enabled else 0

dev_id_enabled.description: 1 If a Gatekeeper allows execution from identified developers else 0

name: shared_folders
description: Folders available to others via SMB or AFP.

name.description: The shared name of the folder as it appears to other users

path.description: Absolute path of shared folder on the local system

name: package_receipts
description: OS X package receipt details.

location.description: Optional relative install path on volume

name: crashes
description: Application, System, and Mobile App crash logs.

pid.description: Process (or thread) ID of the crashed process

version.description: Version info of the crashed process

parent.description: Parent PID of the crashed process

responsible.description: Process responsible for the crashed process

uid.description: User ID of the crashed process

datetime.description: Date/Time at which the crash occurred

stack_trace.description: Most recent frame from the stack trace

registers.description: The value of the system registers

name: account_policy_data
description: Additional OS X user account data from the AccountPolicy section of OpenDirectory.

creation_time.description: When the account was first created

failed_login_count.description: The number of times the user failed to login with the correct password. Resets after a correct password is entered

failed_login_timestamp.description: The time of the last failed login attempt. Resets after a correct password is entered

password_last_set_time.description: The time the password was last changed

name: nvram
description: Apple NVRAM variable listing.

name: iokit_devicetree
description: The IOKit registry matching the DeviceTree plane.

service.description: 1 if the device conforms to IOService else 0

busy_state.description: 1 if the device is in a busy state else 0

name: apps
description: OS X applications installed in known search paths (e.g., /Applications).

element.description: Does the app identify as a background agent

minimum_system_version.description: Minimum version of OS X required for the app to run

category.description: The UTI that categorizes the app for the App Store

last_opened_time.description: The time that the app was last used

name: keychain_items
description: Generic details about keychain items.

name: plist
description: Read and parse a plist file.

value.description: String value of most CF types

name: ntfs_acl_permissions
description: Retrieve NTFS ACL permission information for files and directories.

path.description: Path to the file or directory.

type.description: Type of access mode for the access control entry.

principal.description: User or group to which the ACE applies.

access.description: Specific permissions that indicate the rights described by the ACE.

inherited_from.description: The inheritance policy of the ACE.

name: scheduled_tasks
description: Lists all of the tasks in the Windows task scheduler.

action.description: Actions executed by the scheduled task

path.description: Path to the executable to be run

enabled.description: Whether or not the scheduled task is enabled

hidden.description: Whether or not the task is visible in the UI

next_run_time.description: Timestamp the task is scheduled to run next

last_run_message.description: Exit status message of the last task run

last_run_code.description: Exit status code of the last task run

name: windows_crashes
description: Extracted information from Windows crash logs (Minidumps).

module.description: Path of the crashed module within the process

path.description: Path of the executable file for the crashed process

pid.description: Process ID of the crashed process

tid.description: Thread ID of the crashed thread

version.description: File version info of the crashed process

process_uptime.description: Uptime of the process in seconds

stack_trace.description: Multiple stack frames from the stack trace

exception_message.description: The NTSTATUS error message associated with the exception code

exception_address.description: Address (in hex) where the exception occurred

registers.description: The values of the system registers

command_line.description: Command-line string passed to the crashed process

current_directory.description: Current working directory of the crashed process

username.description: Username of the user who ran the crashed process

machine_name.description: Name of the machine where the crash happened

major_version.description: Windows major version of the machine

minor_version.description: Windows minor version of the machine

build_number.description: Windows build number of the crashing machine

name: services
description: Lists all installed Windows services and their relevant data.

service_type.description: Service Type: OWN_PROCESS, SHARE_PROCESS and maybe Interactive (can interact with the desktop)

status.description: Service Current status: STOPPED, START_PENDING, STOP_PENDING, RUNNING, CONTINUE_PENDING, PAUSE_PENDING, PAUSED

pid.description: the Process ID of the service

start_type.description: Service start type: BOOT_START, SYSTEM_START, AUTO_START, DEMAND_START, DISABLED

win32_exit_code.description: The error code that the service uses to report an error that occurs when it is starting or stopping

service_exit_code.description: The service-specific error code that the service returns when an error occurs while the service is starting or stopping

user_account.description: The name of the account that the service process will be logged on as when it runs. This name can be of the form Domain\UserName. If the account belongs to the built-in domain, the name can be of the form .\UserName.

name: kva_speculative_info
description: Display kernel virtual address and speculative execution information for the system.

kva_shadow_enabled.description: Kernel Virtual Address shadowing is enabled.

kva_shadow_user_global.description: User pages are marked as global.

kva_shadow_pcid.description: Kernel VA PCID flushing optimization is enabled.

bp_system_pol_disabled.description: Branch Predictions are disabled via system policy.

bp_microcode_disabled.description: Branch Predictions are disabled due to lack of microcode update.

cpu_spec_ctrl_supported.description: SPEC_CTRL MSR supported by CPU Microcode.

cpu_pred_cmd_supported.description: PRED_CMD MSR supported by CPU Microcode.

name: patches
description: Lists all the patches applied. Note: This does not include patches applied via MSI or downloaded from Windows Update (e.g. Service Packs).

csname.description: The name of the host the patch is installed on.

hotfix_id.description: The KB ID of the patch.

installed_by.description: The system context in which the patch as installed.

install_date.description: Indicates when the patch was installed. Lack of a value does not indicate that the patch was not installed.

installed_on.description: The date when the patch was installed.

name: ie_extensions
description: Internet Explorer browser extensions.

name: shared_resources
description: Displays shared resources on a computer system running Windows. This may be a disk drive, printer, interprocess communication, or other sharable device.

description.description: A textual description of the object

install_date.description: Indicates when the object was installed. Lack of a value does not indicate that the object is not installed.

status.description: String that indicates the current status of the object.

allow_maximum.description: Number of concurrent users for this resource has been limited. If True, the value in the MaximumAllowed property is ignored.

maximum_allowed.description: Limit on the maximum number of users allowed to use this resource concurrently. The value is only valid if the AllowMaximum property is set to FALSE.

name.description: Alias given to a path set up as a share on a computer system running Windows.

path.description: Local path of the Windows share.

type.description: Type of resource being shared. Types include: disk drives, print queues, interprocess communications (IPC), and general devices.

name: wmi_cli_event_consumers
description: WMI CommandLineEventConsumer, which can be used for persistence on Windows. See https://www.blackhat.com/docs/us-15/materials/us-15-Graeber-Abusing-Windows-Management-Instrumentation-WMI-To-Build-A-Persistent%20Asynchronous-And-Fileless-Backdoor-wp.pdf for more details.

command_line_template.description: Standard string template that specifies the process to be started. This property can be NULL, and the ExecutablePath property is used as the command line.

executable_path.description: Module to execute. The string can specify the full path and file name of the module to execute, or it can specify a partial name. If a partial name is specified, the current drive and current directory are assumed.

relative_path.description: Relative path to the class or instance.

name: video_info
description: Retrieve video card information of the machine.

color_depth.description: The amount of bits per pixel to represent color.

driver_date.description: The date listed on the installed driver.

driver_version.description: The version of the installed driver.

video_mode.description: The current resolution of the display.

name: registry
description: All of the Windows registry hives.

key.description: Name of the key to search for

name.description: Name of the registry value entry

type.description: Type of the registry value, or 'subkey' if item is a subkey

mtime.description: timestamp of the most recent registry write

name: drivers
description: Details for in-use Windows device drivers. This does not display installed but unused drivers.

service.description: Driver service name, if one exists

signed.description: Whether the driver is signed or not

name: disk_info
description: Retrieve basic information about the physical disks of a system.

partitions.description: Number of detected partitions on disk.

disk_index.description: Physical drive number of the disk.

type.description: The interface type of the disk.

id.description: The unique identifier of the drive on the system.

pnp_device_id.description: The unique identifier of the drive on the system.

name.description: The label of the disk object.

serial.description: The serial number of the disk.

description.description: The OS's description of the disk.

name: chocolatey_packages
description: Chocolatey packages installed in a system.

license.description: License under which package is launched

path.description: Path at which this package resides

name: logical_drives
description: Details for logical drives on the system. A logical drive generally represents a single partition.

device_id.description: The drive id, usually the drive name, e.g., 'C:'.

description.description: The canonical description of the drive, e.g. 'Logical Fixed Disk', 'CD-ROM Disk'.

free_space.description: The amount of free space, in bytes, of the drive (-1 on failure).

size.description: The total amount of space, in bytes, of the drive (-1 on failure).

file_system.description: The file system of the drive.

boot_partition.description: True if Windows booted from this drive.

name: ntdomains
description: Display basic NT domain information of a Windows machine.

name.description: The label by which the object is known.

client_site_name.description: The name of the site where the domain controller is configured.

dc_site_name.description: The name of the site where the domain controller is located.

dns_forest_name.description: The name of the root of the DNS tree.

domain_controller_address.description: The IP Address of the discovered domain controller..

domain_controller_name.description: The name of the discovered domain controller.

status.description: The current status of the domain object.

name: authenticode
description: File (executable, bundle, installer, disk) code signing status.

path.description: Must provide a path or directory

original_program_name.description: The original program name that the publisher has signed

name: logon_sessions
description: Windows Logon Session.

logon_id.description: A locally unique identifier (LUID) that identifies a logon session.

user.description: The account name of the security principal that owns the logon session.

logon_domain.description: The name of the domain used to authenticate the owner of the logon session.

authentication_package.description: The authentication package used to authenticate the owner of the logon session.

logon_time.description: The time the session owner logged on.

logon_server.description: The name of the server used to authenticate the owner of the logon session.

dns_domain_name.description: The DNS name for the owner of the logon session.

upn.description: The user principal name (UPN) for the owner of the logon session.

logon_script.description: The script used for logging on.

profile_path.description: The home directory for the logon session.

home_directory.description: The home directory for the logon session.

home_directory_drive.description: The drive location of the home directory of the logon session.

name: pipes
description: Named and Anonymous pipes.

pid.description: Process ID of the process to which the pipe belongs

instances.description: Number of instances of the named pipe

max_instances.description: The maximum number of instances creatable for this pipe

flags.description: The flags indicating whether this pipe connection is a server or client end, and if the pipe for sending messages or bytes

name: wmi_filter_consumer_binding
description: Lists the relationship between event consumers and filters.

consumer.description: Reference to an instance of __EventConsumer that represents the object path to a logical consumer, the recipient of an event.

filter.description: Reference to an instance of __EventFilter that represents the object path to an event filter which is a query that specifies the type of event to be received.

relative_path.description: Relative path to the class or instance.

name: wmi_event_filters
description: Lists WMI event filters.

name.description: Unique identifier of an event filter.

query.description: Windows Management Instrumentation Query Language (WQL) event query that specifies the set of events for consumer notification, and the specific conditions for notification.

query_language.description: Query language that the query is written in.

relative_path.description: Relative path to the class or instance.

name: windows_events
description: Windows Event logs.

datetime.description: System time at which the event occurred

source.description: Source or channel of the event

task.description: Task value associated with the event

level.description: The severity level associated with the event

keywords.description: A bitmask of the keywords defined in the event

name: appcompat_shims
description: Application Compatibility shims are a way to persist malware. This table presents the AppCompat Shim information from the registry in a nice format. See http://files.brucon.org/2015/Tomczak_and_Ballenthin_Shims_for_the_Win.pdf for more details.

executable.description: Name of the executable that is being shimmed. This is pulled from the registry.

path.description: This is the path to the SDB database.

name: powershell_events
description: Powershell script blocks reconstructed to their full script content, this table requires script block logging to be enabled.

time.description: Timestamp the event was received by the osquery event publisher

datetime.description: System time at which the Powershell script event occurred

script_block_id.description: The unique GUID of the powershell script to which this block belongs

script_block_count.description: The total number of script blocks for this script

script_text.description: The text content of the Powershell script

script_name.description: The name of the Powershell script

script_path.description: The path for the Powershell script

cosine_similarity.description: How similar the Powershell script is to a provided 'normal' character frequency

name: winbaseobj
description: Lists named Windows objects in the default object directories, across all terminal services sessions.

name: cpu_info
description: Retrieve cpu hardware info of the machine.

processor_type.description: The processor type, such as Central, Math, or Video.

availability.description: The availability and status of the CPU.

cpu_status.description: The current operating status of the CPU.

number_of_cores.description: The number of cores of the CPU.

logical_processors.description: The number of logical processors of the CPU.

address_width.description: The width of the CPU address bus.

current_clock_speed.description: The current frequency of the CPU.

max_clock_speed.description: The maximum possible frequency of the CPU.

socket_designation.description: The assigned socket on the board for the given CPU.

name: wmi_bios_info
description: Lists important information from the system bios.

name: programs
description: Represents products as they are installed by Windows Installer. A product generally correlates to one installation package on Windows. Some fields may be blank as Windows installation details are left to the discretion of the product author.

install_location.description: The installation location directory of the product.

install_source.description: The installation source of the product.

uninstall_string.description: Path and filename of the uninstaller.

install_date.description: Date that this product was installed on the system.

identifying_number.description: Product identification such as a serial number on software, or a die number on a hardware chip.

name: wmi_script_event_consumers
description: WMI ActiveScriptEventConsumer, which can be used for persistence on Windows. See https://www.blackhat.com/docs/us-15/materials/us-15-Graeber-Abusing-Windows-Management-Instrumentation-WMI-To-Build-A-Persistent%20Asynchronous-And-Fileless-Backdoor-wp.pdf for more details.

name.description: Unique identifier for the event consumer.

scripting_engine.description: Name of the scripting engine to use, for example, 'VBScript'. This property cannot be NULL.

script_file_name.description: Name of the file from which the script text is read, intended as an alternative to specifying the text of the script in the ScriptText property.

script_text.description: Text of the script that is expressed in a language known to the scripting engine. This property must be NULL if the ScriptFileName property is not NULL.

relative_path.description: Relative path to the class or instance.

name: physical_disk_performance
description: Provides provides raw data from performance counters that monitor hard or fixed disk drives on the system.

avg_disk_bytes_per_read.description: Average number of bytes transferred from the disk during read operations

avg_disk_bytes_per_write.description: Average number of bytes transferred to the disk during write operations

avg_disk_read_queue_length.description: Average number of read requests that were queued for the selected disk during the sample interval

avg_disk_write_queue_length.description: Average number of write requests that were queued for the selected disk during the sample interval

avg_disk_sec_per_read.description: Average time, in seconds, of a read operation of data from the disk

avg_disk_sec_per_write.description: Average time, in seconds, of a write operation of data to the disk

current_disk_queue_length.description: Number of requests outstanding on the disk at the time the performance data is collected

percent_disk_read_time.description: Percentage of elapsed time that the selected disk drive is busy servicing read requests

percent_disk_write_time.description: Percentage of elapsed time that the selected disk drive is busy servicing write requests

percent_disk_time.description: Percentage of elapsed time that the selected disk drive is busy servicing read or write requests

percent_idle_time.description: Percentage of time during the sample interval that the disk was idle

name: autoexec
description: Aggregate of executables that will automatically execute on the target machine. This is an amalgamation of other tables like services, scheduled_tasks, startup_items and more.

source.description: Source table of the autoexec item

name: bitlocker_info
description: Retrieve bitlocker status of the machine.

drive_letter.description: Drive letter of the encrypted drive.

conversion_status.description: The bitlocker conversion status of the drive.

protection_status.description: The bitlocker protection status of the drive.

encryption_method.description: The encryption type of the device.

name: certificates
description: Certificate Authorities installed in Keychains/ca-bundles.

ca.description: 1 if CA: true (certificate is an authority) else 0

key_strength.description: Key size used for RSA/DSA, or curve name

key_usage.description: Certificate key usage and extended key usage

sha1.description: SHA1 hash of the raw certificate contents

path.description: Path to Keychain or PEM bundle

name: startup_items
description: Applications and binaries set as user/login startup items.

source.description: Directory or plist containing startup item

status.description: Startup status; either enabled or disabled

username.description: The user associated with the startup item

name: osquery_flags
description: Configurable flags that modify osquery's behavior.

name: osquery_extensions
description: List of active osquery extensions.

uuid.description: The transient ID assigned for communication

sdk_version.description: osquery SDK version used to build the extension

path.description: Path of the extenion's domain socket or library path

type.description: SDK extension type: extension or module

name: osquery_events
description: Information about the event publishers and subscribers.

subscriptions.description: Number of subscriptions the publisher received or subscriber used

events.description: Number of events emitted or received since osquery started

refreshes.description: Publisher only: number of runloop restarts

active.description: 1 if the publisher or subscriber is active else 0

name: osquery_info
description: Top level information about the running version of osquery.

uuid.description: Unique ID provided by the system

instance_id.description: Unique, long-lived ID per instance of osquery

config_hash.description: Hash of the working configuration state

config_valid.description: 1 if the config was loaded and considered valid, else 0

build_distro.description: osquery toolkit platform distribution name (os version)

start_time.description: UNIX time in seconds when the process started

watcher.description: Process (or thread/handle) ID of optional watcher process

name: osquery_registry
description: List the osquery registry plugins.

internal.description: 1 If the plugin is internal else 0

active.description: 1 If this plugin is active else 0

name: time
description: Track current date and time in the system.

local_time.description: Current local UNIX time in the system

local_timezone.description: Current local timezone in the system

unix_time.description: Current UNIX time in the system, converted to UTC if --utc enabled

timestamp.description: Current timestamp (log format) in the system

datetime.description: Current date and time (ISO format) in the system

iso_8601.description: Current time (ISO format) in the system

name: osquery_schedule
description: Information about the current queries that are scheduled in osquery.

name.description: The given name for this query

interval.description: The interval in seconds to run this query, not an exact interval

executions.description: Number of times the query was executed

last_executed.description: UNIX time stamp in seconds of the last completed execution

blacklisted.description: 1 if the query is blacklisted else 0

output_size.description: Total number of bytes generated by the query

average_memory.description: Average private memory left after executing

name: file
description: Interactive filesystem attributes and metadata.

symlink.description: 1 if the path is a symlink, otherwise 0

name: osquery_packs
description: Information about the current query packs that are loaded in osquery.

name.description: The given name for this query pack

platform.description: Platforms this query is supported on

version.description: Minimum osquery version that this query will run on

shard.description: Shard restriction limit, 1-100, 0 meaning no restriction

discovery_cache_hits.description: The number of times that the discovery query used cached values since the last time the config was reloaded

discovery_executions.description: The number of times that the discovery queries have been executed since the last time the config was reloaded

active.description: Whether this pack is active (the version, platform and discovery queries match) yes=1, no=0.
